name: Wanderstar: LD43
description:
Wanderstar: LD43 - Sacrifices must be made

Controls: Mouse and Spacebar Right click to move. Left click to attack. Spacebar to draw or holster your gun.

Potions are a full heal each. They trigger automatically (they’re lives) and the heart altar will fully heal you, but doesn’t restore potions. There are a couple more altars in the game that do cool stuff, too.

Browser version is mostly untested so if it runs poorly for you, please try the download.
